org.apache.felix.ipojo
Class ComponentFactory.PrimitiveTypeDescription

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.felix.ipojo.architecture.ComponentTypeDescription
      org.apache.felix.ipojo.ComponentFactory.PrimitiveTypeDescription
Enclosing class:
ComponentFactory
private final class ComponentFactory.PrimitiveTypeDescription
extends ComponentTypeDescription

This class defines the description of primitive (non-composite) component types. An instance of this class will be returned when invoking the IPojoFactory.getComponentDescription() method.

Author:
Felix Project Team

getPropertiesToPublish

public java.util.Dictionary getPropertiesToPublish()
Computes the properties to publish. The component.class property contains the implementation class name.
